item.title: U.S. kills six in latest strike on alleged drug boat, Hegseth says
item.description: The operation marked the 10th known attack on suspected smugglers from Latin America, pushing the reported death toll to at least 43.

item.title: Social Security cost-of-living rise in line with inflation but trails key expenses
item.description: The annual cost-of-living adjustment is in line with overall inflation, but it trails categories such as energy and health care.

item.title: Here are the donors contributing to Trump’s White House ballroom
item.description: Companies such as Google, Amazon and Meta are on the list of donors to the planned 90,000-square-foot ballroom. The East Wing has been demolished as p...

item.title: Republicans who once opposed Trump’s military impulses now lower their guard
item.description: The president’s talk of further escalating his campaign in Latin America poses uncomfortable questions for some in Congress.

item.title: Trump says he’s canceling trade negotiations with Canada over anti-tariff ad
